name: Kawaii Keyring Cutie!
description: Up for grabs is a huge selection of my adorable 'Kawaii Keyring Cuties'! They are made from super soft stripey pink or blue fleece and come with mobile-phone straps to hang from your phone, bag or purse. Each keyring is roughly 9cms x 4 cms x 3 cms and is filled with squishy stuffing. To purchase a keyring please select your colour and then proceed to the checkout! Your keyring will then be selected at random. To see our Insured Postage options, please see our P&P Options. If you have any questions please Contact Us. ------------------------------------------------------ Ⓒlollyvillage.com 2010

name: Christmas Tree the Choc-Ice Plushie
description: Name: Christmas Tree Flavour: Pine Cone Christmas tree plushie prefers to be called Chris. He loves this time of year and enjoys eating lots of gingerbread cookies and watching Christmas movie reruns. Meet Chris, the choc-ice plushie. He measures roughly 40 x 22 x 8cms and is made from lovely winter green fleece. His tinsel (garland) is made from red pompom trimming, and he has a 3D stuffed star, cute candy cane and gingerbread man decorations and he is filled with squishy stuffing. He is also available through our etsy.com shop www.munkeysbasket.etsy.com/shop To see our Insured Postage options, please see our P&P Options. If you have any questions please Contact Us. ------------------------------------------------------ Ⓒlollyvillage.com 2010

name: Lolly Hot Water Bottle Cover
description: The Lolly Hot Water Bottle Cover. Made from lovely soft fleece, felt and love, this cover is the best thing for your hot water bottle for the cold winter nights. Perfect fit for a standard sized hot water bottle. Cuddly and super cute, you won't want to put yours down! Two Colours are available now: Blue Bunny: Made from a lovely soft blue fleece and is simple but cute. He will happily keep you warm and snuggle up beside you! Peaches and Cream: NEW AND IN STOCK! She is made from super soft baby pink and cream fleece and has a cream double sided satin bow for extra cuteness. New pictures still to come, new edition does not have rosy cheeks and the 'stick' fits more snugly around the the HWB. If you have any questions please Contact Us. ------------------------------------------- To see other images of available HWBC, please click the arrow below the picture. Thank you. ------------------------------------------- ⓒlollyvillage.com 2010

name: Vampsicle the plushie lolly
description: Name: Vampsicle Flavour: Raspberry Vampsicle is a cuddly plushie, who is looking for his next 'companion' - victim. Normally £25.00. Meet Vampsicle the plushie lolly. He is made from lovely soft white and black fleece and has a black felt cloak. His 'blood stained' vampire teeth are made from white and red felt. He measures roughly 44 x 22 x 8cms. To see our Insured Postage options, please see our P&P Options. If you have any questions please Contact Us. ------------------------------------------------------ Ⓒlollyvillage.com 2010
